data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Kandahar, Afghanistan - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. During this period, minimum temperatures drop to a chilly 0°C (32°F) in January, with maximum temperatures marking a comfortable 15.4°C (59.7°F) in February following a similar trend, rainfall totals escalate during the winter, starting from 20mm (0.79") in December and reaching its peak of 54mm (2.13") in January. This period is the coldest in the year, with average minimum temperatures falling to 1°C (33.8°F) in January coupled with the least amount of daylight, merely 10.1 hours in December.
data.text:
Average temperature

Kandahar, Afghanistan

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (40.2°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (12.2°C).

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (22.5°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (0°C).

Average rainfall days

Kandahar, Afghanistan

The months with the highest number of rainy days are January, February and March (6 days).

The months with the least rainy days are June, July, August and September (0 days).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Kandahar, Afghanistan

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 14h and 12min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 10h and 6min).

The month with the most sunshine is June (Average sunshine: 12h and 18min).

The month with the least sunshine is January (Average sunshine: 6h and 24min).
